survey.introduction: Hello, I'm from Communicus, a consumer opinion firm. We are conducting a survey and would like to include you.

questions.question: Do you smoke filter, non-menthol cigarettes?
How many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?
What is your regular brand of cigarettes, that is, the one brand you smoke most often?
questions.note: REFER TO LIST OF BRANDS. IF BRAND GIVEN IS FROM QUOTA 1, THEN CIRCLE -2. IF FROM QUOTA 2 THEN CIRCLE -2.

questions.question: Which of the following statements apply to you?

statements.A: I eat dinner in a restaurant at least once a month.
statements.C: I do most of the food shopping for myself and/or my family.
statements.D: I have taken an airline trip on a scheduled commercial airline in the past 12 months.

questions.question: Into which of the following age groups do you fall?
